title: The Mort Awards - Nominations and votes
content:
Yes, its just a few hours to go before the end of 2005, and I thought I may as well get this topic started early, as there's not much chance you'll actually be able to do something worthy of an award before the year ends.

The Mort awards are only awarded to those who wish to participate; if you are seriously offended [and don't want a nice little statuette on your cofee table] then state so in this topic and you will be dropped from nomination [This does not apply to Harvey Or Najawa, by popular request] Also, there will be no insults or flaming in this topic, this is a calm polite discussion, not a chance to hurl insults.

Currently this is the nomination phase, nominate peole for existing categories, or nominate a new category. As I'm too lazy to browze all the topics, nominations will probbably be needed. Feel free also to vote, votes can be changed. Nominations close next week. Current categories are:


1.) Community Dispirit: The Keener who has acted the most Mortlike during the past year.

Nominiees: Ek Djaser[1 vote] Harvey Levellord Lord of Globox[1 vote] Najawa[3 votes] Xtra

2.) Artwork: The keener who has done either the best picture of Mort, the worst picture of Keen or a piece of artwork so devilish it deserves an award.

Nominiees: Galaxieretter Bp[1vote][img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v499/Nevad/pchic002.jpg[/img]


3.)Fanfiction: The Keener who has shown Mort in the most positive light, or Keen in the most negitive light, or has just written an evil fanfic.

Nominiees: Harvey[2 votes] Levellord[1 vote] Najawa[1 vote] Sarah[ 1 vote]


4.) Modding: The mod that made the most Keeners give up in sheer frustration, or whose graphics cused the most siezures, or generally pissed the hell outta you.

Nominiees: KeenRush[1 vote] Najawa[1 vote] Xky[2 votes]


5.) The Web: The most Mortish website, or just a website that annoys or amuses you.

Nominees: Bp[1 vote] CC314[1 vote] Najawa.com [2 votes]


6.) That little something: Just someone who you think deserves a Mort award for something they've done this year, whatever that may be.

Nominees: Galxieretter and Levellord[3 votes] Najawa[2 votes] Br1ck [1 vote] Xtra[1 vote] Spleen[1 vote]



Get voting!

A proud member of the Spleen Extinction society

[img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v410/Gannalev/rcwn.png[/img]

"No one should be here."
-Levellord

title: hmm..
content:
1.) Community Dispirit: Most Mort-like? Djaser's always had an evil streak... sure, he's playful about it, but he can come off as a jerk if you don't read carefully.

2.) Artwork: bp's picture of Keen struck me as kinda cheesey. "Guess who's back" isn't exactly a snappy catchphrase. (Not intended to insult, just making a nomination)

3.)Fanfiction: LevelLord destroyed my namesake in her "A really tough day" fanfic, and Sarah helped. :-P And Mort was sullied simply by letting Najawa live. (No offense, Naj)

4.) Modding: Well, y'know, I did tell people I'd have XkyKeen4 done by now... *runs*

5.) The Web: CC314. I've gotta use it whenever I want to reference a level, because of the very-useful level maps, but I really don't like that "Die, harmless slug!" splash page I have to click through every time.

6.) That little something: Galaxieretter and LevelLord, as a team, in the MSN chats. I've never felt so old or unnecessary as the 10 minutes I spent in that window. :-(

[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/posted-pics/XkyRauhKeenLogo.png[/img]

title: Re: hmm..
content:
[quote]Quote:[hr]6.) That little something: Galaxieretter and LevelLord, as a team, in the MSN chats. I've never felt so old or unnecessary as the 10 minutes I spent in that window. :-([hr][/quote]
No wait... what? [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-confused.gif[/img] I don't even remember what we talked about then...
Old or unnecessary? What are you talking about? I am a bit confused by that.

Oh... and just like Vegas... What happens in the MSN chats STAYS in the MSN chats... [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-mischief.gif[/img]

Ok Br1ck... I nominate you for "Person who nags for a Mort award because they can't get any other award" award.[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-wink.gif[/img] -----------------------

And we have our winners!

EDIT: I Notice nobody noticed or rplied to this *bumps back up*

Aaanyway, I've created some nice shiny [well, no not shiny, this *is* the Mort awards] trophies for all our losers; last place gets a big one, second to last gets a small one:

[img]http://tn3-2.deviantart.com/fs10/300W/i/2006/119/3/f/A_winner_is_me_by_Ziblink.jpg[/img]


Losers:

Community dispirit: 1st Place: Najawa [2nd: Djaser]

Artwork: 1st place: Bp [2nd Galaxieretter]

Fanfiction: 1st place: Harvey [2nd: Sarah]

Modding: 1st place: Xky [2nd KeenRush]

The web: 1st place: Najawa.com [2nd CC314]

That lil something: 1st place Gal and Levellord [2nd Najawa]


So enjoy your awards and thankyou for everyone who voted!
